data.title: Mg Ramachandran: Latest News, Photos, Videos on Mg Ramachandran

data.meta_description: Find Mg Ramachandran Latest News, Videos & Pictures on Mg Ramachandran and see latest updates, news, information from NDTV.COM. Explore more on Mg Ramachandran.

News

'Mg Ramachandran' - 57 News Result(s)

India News | Asian News International | Tuesday February 27, 2024

Invoking the legacy of veteran leaders MG Ramachandran and Jayalalithaa, Prime Minister Narendra Modi called the former Tamil Nadu Chief Minister MGR a "true leader," and hailed MGR's commitment to governance devoid of "dynasty politics".

www.ndtv.com

India News | Press Trust of India | Wednesday January 17, 2024

Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Wednesday paid tribute to former Tamil Nadu chief minister MG Ramachandran on his birth anniversary and said he left a lasting impact on the state's growth and development.

www.ndtv.com

Education | Reported by Press Trust of India | Tuesday December 6, 2022

Justice Devan Ramachandran has directed the university to consider the application moved by the charitable society which would run the college and to issue appropriate orders before December 15.

www.ndtv.com/education

Tamil Nadu News | Press Trust of India | Tuesday January 25, 2022

A statue of late Tamil Nadu Chief Minister MG Ramachandran was on Tuesday found damaged in Thanjavur, with the opposition AIADMK strongly condemning the incident and called for action against the "anti-social elements" behind the vandalism.

www.ndtv.com

India News | Press Trust of India | Friday November 26, 2021

AIADMK founder MG Ramachandran's niece Leelavathi died on Friday following a brief illness, the party said.

www.ndtv.com

India News | Reported by J Sam Daniel Stalin, Edited by Ashutosh Tripathi | Saturday October 16, 2021

VK Sasikala, who announced in March that she will "stay away from politics and public life", paid floral tributes at the memorials of former chief ministers Jayalalithaa, MG Ramachandran and CN Annadurai along the Marina today.

www.ndtv.com

India News | Press Trust of India | Friday September 10, 2021

The opposition party AIADMK in Tamil Nadu today objected to certain references about party stalwarts -- the late Mr MG Ramachandran and Ms J Jayalalithaa -- in the latter's multi-lingual biopic Thalaivi, and wanted the scenes deleted.

www.ndtv.com

India News | Reported by J Sam Daniel Stalin, Edited by Harish Pullanoor | Friday March 12, 2021

Kamal Haasan, veteran Tamil movie actor and founder of the fledgeling Makkal Needhi Maiam, will be contesting the upcoming state Assembly polls from the Coimbatore South constituency. He made the announcement today while releasing his party's second list of candidates. Grapevine had it earlier that he may choose to fight from Alandur in Chennai, a ...

www.ndtv.com

India News | Written by J Sam Daniel Stalin, Edited by Harish Pullanoor | Thursday March 4, 2021

Even going by Tamil Nadu's tradition of matinee-idols-turned leaders, Kamal Haasan, at 62, was a relatively late entrant to the political scene by February 2018. His Makkal Needhi Maiam (MNM), however, has perhaps been one of the earliest among all state or national-level parties to have entered campaign mode this poll season. It has now already la...

www.ndtv.com

Tamil Nadu News | ANI | Tuesday February 9, 2021

Expelled AIADMK leader VK Sasikala on Tuesday reached Chennai where she visited party founder MG Ramachandran's house and paid floral tributes.

www.ndtv.com

India News | Press Trust of India | Saturday January 30, 2021

A temple dedicated to AIADMK icons, MG Ramachandran and J Jayalalithaa, was unveiled near Madurai in Tamil Nadu on Saturday by Chief Minister K Palaniswami and Deputy Chief Minister O Panneerselvam.

www.ndtv.com

India News | Written by J Sam Daniel Stalin | Saturday January 30, 2021

A temple dedicated to late Tamil Nadu chief minister J Jayalalithaa and her mentor in Madurai will be inaugurated by Chief Minister E Palaniswami on Saturday. The event comes just months ahead of the assembly election, the first after the AIADMK chief's death in 2016.

www.ndtv.com

India News | Press Trust of India | Sunday January 17, 2021

Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Sunday paid tributes to AIADMK founder and former Tamil Nadu chief minister MG Ramachandran on his birth anniversary and lauded his efforts towards poverty alleviation and emphasis on women empowerment.

www.ndtv.com

Entertainment | Written by Aakanksha Raghuvanshi | Thursday December 24, 2020

"It was not just an honour to play the role of Puratchi Thalaivar MGR, but a great responsibility," wrote Arvind Swami

www.ndtv.com/entertainment

Tamil Nadu News | Press Trust of India | Sunday December 20, 2020

Makkal Needhi Maiam (MNM) founder Kamal Haasan on Sunday yet again joined issue with the ruling AIADMK over late Chief Minister MG Ramachandran's (MGR) legacy, saying anyone who had ideals like the stalwart could be his "heir".
